channel.title: Project Pearl v5
channel.description:
Hey guys I'm back and I just started a new project :) My main goal is to create an awesome combat system for great pk'ing experience!
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/20u1f28.jpg[/img]
[b]Combat[/b] -New system (melee) 20%. -New range formula 100%. -Magic switching redone 90%. -Dragonfire shield; doesn't charge with dragon breath 90%
[b]PvN[/b] - Fixed magic on npc's ; multibarrage works now, and the player stops running up to them as it did before; first you couldn't farcast npcs.
[b]Extras[/b] - No dupes anymore, as far as I know. - Old runescape inlogscreen added.
[b]This server won't be based on skilling/money making just pk :) Oh yeah, im using Projecy Insanity.[/b]

item.title: Project Pearl v5
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“Wintercanon, post:21, topic:386617”][quote author=moh link=topic=482384.msg3533314#msg3533314 date=1300365876]
I’m just using project insanity because im cbf to add all new pvp items/chaotic and stuff to the client.
[/quote]What’s to say you won’t take any other short cuts then? I’m sorry I don’t support the laziness that is Project Insanity.[/quote]
Read the thread again, I told you this will become an pk server I haven’t got time to write a whole new combat system on a deob 317. I’m using Insanity because it already got a decent combat.
And that’s the main thing I will be working on, perfecting the combat.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Pearl v5
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

equip SGS
activate special attack ( dont atk yet )
get a normal weapon ready ( whip or so )
atk with SGS special , the second you start the anim , switch to the regular weapon

what it does:
from now on , whenever you deal melee damage , you wil heal the amount of damage you hit ,
this effect stops when:

  • players logs out
  • players uses another special attack
  • i dont think it stops upon death , havent tried…

EDIT: only works on NPC’s , not PVP

Read full topic

item.title: Project Pearl v5
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:15, topic:386617”][quote author=dwarvenknight link=topic=482384.msg3534187#msg3534187 date=1300423553]
What’s wrong with PIs combat to begin with? Seems kind of redundant to re-write it imo.
[/quote]

melee combat isnt finised ; it hits higher than it should
magic has some bugs , the most noticeable being the player running to the target after the spell has been cast.
also , the SGS healing glitch/bug has to be fixed[/quote]

What’s the Sgs glitch didn’t know before :o.

Read full topic

item.title: Project Pearl v5
item.dc:creator: @moh moh
item.description:
@moh wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:10, topic:386617”]nice job on the login screen ; also DFS charging with dragons isn’t that hard ; when fighting dragons , when the dragon uses dragonfire as an attack style ( i think its classified as 4 in PI ) make it add 1 DFS charge ( as a new player token ) then define the max limit (50 in RS )
then change the handleDFS and handlsDFSNPC methods to check for charges and delete a charge upon use.
quite simple , i dont know why people havent added it already o.0[/quote]
I know it’s not hard but i don’t want people with a dfs kill a dragon before they can use their shields again.

Read full topic
